meanings: give a warm[cordial] reception[welcome] to a guest

vlive.korean: [이제 알았음] 오늘 손님들도 오시나 봐요? [Now I found it] You brought some guests? 듣기 View video Hyomstore : ep.11 횸스토어 후반기 시작! 다시 돌아온제품PT
vlive.english: [Now I found it] You brought some guests?

vlive.korean: 두 컵을 넣겠습니다 - 손님들 맛있어요? I'll put in 2 cups. - Customers, are you enjoying it? 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full] DREAMCATCHER X Rooftop Live - 드림캐쳐의 루프탑라이브!
vlive.english: I'll put in 2 cups. - Customers, are you enjoying it?

vlive.korean: [식당 손님들의 박수갈채 받을 수 있음] 칭찬받으려고 그러는 거예요? [You can get applause from other customers] Do you do that for praises? 듣기 View video SEVENTEEN : [GOING SEVENTEEN 2020] EP.18 논리나잇 Ⅱ #1 (Debate Night Ⅱ #1)
vlive.english: [You can get applause from other customers] Do you do that for praises?

vlive.korean: [강한 여운을 남기고 가는 깜짝 손님들] 이러고 사라진다고? [Surprise guests leaving huge impacts] Then they just go? 듣기 View video GOT7 : [GOT2DAY 2019] 10. Mark & Jinyoung
vlive.english: [Surprise guests leaving huge impacts] Then they just go?

vlive.korean: 저희 손님들 대접해주세요. Please entertain our guests. 듣기 View video THE BOYZ : Jking around 😎

examples.korean: An expectant hush fell on the guests. 발음듣기 손님들이 기대감으로 갑자기 조용해졌다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: An expectant hush fell on the guests. 발음

examples.korean: He greeted all the guests warmly as they arrived. 발음듣기 그는 손님들이 도착하면 모두 따뜻이 맞았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He greeted all the guests warmly as they arrived. 발음

examples.korean: The guests left in an alcoholic haze. 발음듣기 손님들은 술에 취해 몽롱한 상태로 떠났다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The guests left in an alcoholic haze. 발음

examples.korean: Can I help you, gentlemen? 발음듣기 손님들, 제가 도와 드릴까요? Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Can I help you, gentlemen? 발음

examples.korean: The guests engaged in superficial chatter. 발음듣기 손님들은 가벼운 한담을 나누고 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The guests engaged in superficial chatter. 발음
